member.name: ID3D10Multithread.GetMultithreadProtected
member.summary: Find out if multithreading is turned on or not.
member.returns: Whether or not multithreading is turned on. True means on, false means off.

member.name: ID3D10Multithread.SetMultithreadProtected
member.param: True to turn multithreading on, false to turn it off.
member.returns: True if multithreading was turned on prior to calling this method, false otherwise.

member.name: ID3D10Multithread
member.summary: A multithread interface accesses multithread settings and can only be used if the thread-safe layer is turned on.
